survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and effectiveness of the current Learning & Development programs offered by the company.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the Learning & Development programs currently offered by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for familiarity assessment. Ensure question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the Learning & Development programs currently offered by your company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following Learning & Development programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following Learning & Development programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the Learning & Development programs you have attended?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything except 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the Learning & Development programs you have attended?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything except 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What topics or skills would you like to see covered in future Learning & Development programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What topics or skills would you like to see covered in future Learning & Development programs?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's Learning & Development programs to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything except 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's Learning & Development programs to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything except 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, have prevented you from participating in Learning & Development programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time during work hours
Programs not relevant to my role
Lack of awareness about available programs
Programs not offered at convenient times
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, have prevented you from participating in Learning & Development programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time during work hours
Programs not relevant to my role

questions.question_text: How often do you apply the skills learned from these programs in your daily work?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything except 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure application frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you apply the skills learned from these programs in your daily work?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything except 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What is your preferred format for Learning & Development programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Blended learning (mix of in-person and online)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: What is your preferred format for Learning & Development programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Blended learning (mix of in-person and online)

questions.question_text: How impactful have the Learning & Development programs been for your career growth?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything except 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure perceived impact.

script.question_text: How impactful have the Learning & Development programs been for your career growth?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything except 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the Learning & Development programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 1000 characters.
